\

1. Thou shalt not work from the Downloads folder.

2. Understand how file directories are structured, even if you wish you didn't need to.

3. Know your projection.

4. Save projects early and often!

5. Do not be afraid to google.

6. Don't be afraid to make mistakes (and you will make mistakes).
